Package io.github.eutro.wasm2j.embed

Class Store

java.lang.Object
io.github.eutro.wasm2j.embed.Store
public final class Store extends Object
Formally, in the WebAssembly specification, the store contains (owns) all the values (functions, memories, tables) of a set of modules. Since in pure Java all of these values are managed by the garbage collector, the store does nothing more than handle the runtime instantiation of compiled modules.

In the current implementation, runtime class loading is done as follows:

  • By a subclass of ClassLoader, owned by the store object. The classes of instantiated modules will never be freed while the class loader is reachable, either from this Store or from a class loaded by the class loader. (Java 8-14)
  • Using defineHiddenClass of MethodHandles.Lookup. The classes of instantiated modules are hidden and may be garbage collected when the module instances become unreachable. (Java 15+)

The former may be forced on a given store by calling forceClassLoaderDefiner().

    • setDebugOutput

      public void setDebugOutput(@Nullable @Nullable File debugOutput)
      Set the file to which class bytes are dumped by this store, for debugging purposes.

      The default (or when null is passed to this method) is to not dump class output.

      Parameters:
      debugOutput - The directory to dump output to.
